description: Deal 3 additional Physical Damage. Restore 3 HP when striking with a Basic Attack or slaying a creep.\} Reduce Mana Cost of Skills by 50% while user's level is less than 10. Allows the user to cast regen().

description: \}Deal 4 additional Magical Damage. Restore 4 MP when slaying an enemy. Gain 1 MP at the end of every turn and every few steps on the map. Reduce Mana Cost of Skills by 50% while user's level is less than 10. Allows the user to cast regen().
name: Magus Boon

description: \}Deal 5 additional Damage to Objectives. Restore 5 HP when attacking an Objective or slaying them. Gain 25% increased EXP and Munny from slaying non-Boss Objectives. Reduce Mana Cost of Skills by 50% while user's level is less than 10. Allows the user to cast slay().
name: Jaeger Boon

description: /}Deal 5 additional damage to creeps and minions. When you take damage during a turn, restore 4 HP at the end of that turn. Restore 1 HP at the end of each turn and after steps on the map. Reduce Mana Cost of Skills by 50% while user's level is less than 10. Allows the user to cast regen().
name: Immortal Boon

description: Gain Tailwind and Rebound points 20% faster. Gain 10% increased EXP and Munny.\} Reduce Mana Cost of Skills by 50% while user's level is less than 15. Allows the user to cast regen().
name: Boots

description: After dealing Physical Damage to the same enemy 3 times within 3 turns of each hit, reduce their Defense by 1 stage for 5 turns.
name: Galatine

description: Gain 10% Physical Lifesteal. After casting a Skill, the user's next Basic Attack deals bonus damage equal to 60% unboosted AD - 50% foes unboosted DEF.(Min. 10)
name: Kusanagi

description: Increase Physical Damage dealt by 40%. User is Silenced.
name: Arondight

description: Increase Crit Chance by 6%. Critical Strikes reduce the foe's Defense by 30% instead of 20%.
name: Masamune

description: Increase Crit Chance and Physical Damage dealt by 10%.
name: Muramasa

description: Deal bonus 9 Damage on Physical Attacks after Defense Calculation. Increase this damage by 9 each time it is applied, up to 9 times(max. 90 bonus damage).
name: Kogitsune-maru

description: Increase Crit Chance by 6%. When dealing Physical Damage to an enemy, apply Anti-Heal for 3 turns.
name: Hrunting

description: On Battle Start, gain 2 Stages of Attack Damage for 1 turn. On the turn afterward, lose 1 Stage of Attack Damage for 3 turns.
name: Beagalltach

description: Increase Attack Damage by 25.
name: Kladenets

description: Increase Basic Attack damage by 6% of the target's maximum HP. Gain 10% Physical Lifesteal.
name: Hien

description: Basic Attack is modified to attack twice, dealing 55% of the user's AD and accounting for 50% of the foe's DEF. Gain 12% Physical Lifesteal.
name: Swords of Balin

description: Increase Speed by 10%. Gain 20% Physical Lifesteal.
name: Wallace Sword

description: Basic Attacks deal 50% of that damage to all other enemies as true damage.
name: Secace

description: Increase Ability Power by 30%. Increase MP Cost by 30% and lose 5% of the user's Max HP at the end of each turn of combat.
name: Ascalon

description: Gain 10% Magical Lifesteal. After casting a Skill, the user's next Basic Attack deals bonus damage equal to 60% Base AP - 50% foes Base RES.(Min. 10)
name: Szczerbiec

description: If the user's unboosted Ability Power is at least 20% higher than their unboosted Attack Damage, increase damage dealt by Basic Attacks by 15% AP.
name: Aram

description: Increase the damage dealt by Elemental Effective Magical Attacks by 20%.
name: Green Dragon Crescent Blade

description: Increase Ability Power by 25.
name: Thysus

description: Increase Magical Damage dealt equal to total Lifesteal on target, up to 30%. After dealing Magical Damage to an enemy, reduce their healing by 40% for 2 turns.
name: Gáe Buide

description: Increase Ability Power by 30. Ignore 25 of the foe's Magic Resist.
name: Brionac

description: Increase Ability Power by 30. Ignore 20% of the foe's Magic Resist.
name: Gáe Bulg

description: Increase Magical Damage dealt equal to 5% + 5% for each Stage of Stat Increase on the foe.
name: Kaladanda

description: On Battle Start, gain 2 Stages of Ability Power for 1 turn. On the turn afterward, lose 1 Stage of Ability Power for 3 turns.
name: Merlin's Staff

description: Increase Magical Damage dealt equal to 5~30%, increased based on how much more maximum HP the foe has compared to the user.(Reachs max damage at 30% maximum HP difference)
name: Gríðarvölr

description: Ignore 20 of the foe's Magic Resist.\} After dealing Magical Damage to an enemy, they take 4% of their maximum HP as damage at the end of their turn for 3 turns. If the enemy is afflicted by any other Negative Status Effect or Stat Debuff, double the damage taken.
name: Power of Domination

description: Boost the Power of the user's Skills by 30%. After dealing damage to an opponent, the user takes 10% of their max HP in recoil damage.
name: Claíomh Solais

description: When using a Skill with Power 80 or less, increase the Power of the skill by 50%.
name: Gungnir

description: If user is afflicted by a Negative Status effect, increase damage dealt by 25%.
name: Járngreipr

description: Increase Luck by 20%. When you Critically Strike, gain a random stat buff for 3 turns and inflict a random debuff on the enemy for 2 turns.
name: Ruyi

description: When struck in the user's Elemental Weakness, increase AD and AP by 2 stages for 3 turns.
name: Yata no Kagami

description: Increase Momentum Gain by 30%. Increase damage dealt by 0~20%, scaling with current Momentum.
name: Sword of Laban

description: Increase damage dealt by difference in Tier between user and target, gain 20% increase damage for each Tier the target is higher than the user. Only applies to Players.
name: Clarent

description: Increase Attack Damage and Ability Power by 30%.
name: Excalibur

description: Gain 50 Momentum at the start of each battle. Increase Base Power of Ultimate Abilities by 10%, 30% if Overcharged.
name: Pure Oxygen Torpedo

description: Increase Power of Fire Type Skills by 20%.
name: Fire Stone

description: Increase Power of Water Type Skills by 20%.
name: Water Stone

description: Increase Power of Earth Type Skills by 20%.
name: Earth Stone

description: Increase Power of Wind Type Skills by 20%.
name: Wind Stone

description: Increase Power of Electric Type Skills by 20%.
name: Electric Stone

description: Increase Power of Steel Type Skills by 20%.
name: Steel Stone

description: Increase Power of Neutral Type Skills by 40%.
name: Force Orb

description: Increase Speed by 25. Gain 1 Cooldown Reduction.
name: Fast-Walker Boots

description: Increase Speed by 20. Gain 1 Stage of Attack Damage for 1 Turn at the start of each battle.
name: Falcon Boots

description: Increase Speed by 20. Gain 1 Stage of Ability Power for 1 Turn at the start of each battle.
name: Raven Boots

description: Increase Speed by 25. Gain 1 Stage of Speed for 1 Turn at the start of each battle.
name: Talaria Boots

description: Increase Speed by 25. Ignore 5% of enemy Defense when dealing Physical Damage.
name: Warrior Greaves

description: Increase Speed by 25. Ignore 5% of enemy Magic Resist when dealing Magical Damage.
name: Magus Greaves

description: Increase Speed by 25. Ignore 10% of enemy Defense and Magic Resist when dealing Elemental Weakness damage.
name: Ragnar Boots

description: Increase Speed by 40. Follow Up Attack damage increased by 25%.
name: Cloud-Stepping Boots

description: Decrease Physical Damage taken by 10%. When struck by Basic Attacks, deal damage to the attacker equal to 10% of the user's Defense.
name: Megingjörð

description: Defense Reduction on Critical Strikes against the user is halved.
name: Aphrodite's Mythic Girdle

description: Increase Defense by 30
name: Coat of Padarn Beisrudd

description: If attacker's Attack Damage is 30% or more greater than yours, reducing incoming Physical Damage by 15%.
name: Velificatio

description: Reduce Physical Damage by 10%, increased per consecutive damage taken from enemies that turn.
name: Pridwen

description: Decrease Magical Damage taken by 10%. When struck by Magical Damage, gain MP equal to 50% of that Skill's MP Cost(min. 4)
name: Caduceus

description: Decrease Elemental Effective Bonus of Magic Damage taken from 50% to 20%.
name: Phylactery

description: When you would take Magical Damage equal to 30% or more than your current HP, reduce the total damage by 30%.
name: Yasakani no Magatama

description: Increase Magic Resist by 30.
name: Pair Dadeni

description: Reduce damage dealt and damage taken by 20%.
name: Courtain

description: Once per battle, when your HP drops below 40%, gain a shield equal to 40% of your maximum HP for 3 turns.
name: Mantle of Arthur

description: Healing effects on the user are 1.3x effective.
name: Rod of Asclepius

description: At the end of each turn, restore 8% of user's maximum HP.
name: Crown of Immortality

description: Increase Maximum HP by 10%. Further increase Maximum HP by Level/2.
name: Kavacha

description: If you are at full HP, if you would take 100% of your HP as damage, reduce damage taken by 80%.
name: Blood of Christ

description: Once per battle, when at 40% HP or less, gain 40% Damage Reduction for 3 turns.
name: Angrvaðall

description: Once per battle, when at 40% HP or less, become Invincible for 1 turn afterward. While invincible, the user has 0 AD and AP.
name: Aegis

description: For the first turn of combat, you are Debuff Immune.
name: Hagoromo

description: On Battle Start, reduce Attack Damage of all enemies by 1 Stage for 2 turns.
name: Ymir's Blood

description: On Battle Start, reduce Speed of all enemies by 1 Stage for 2 turns.
name: Fafnir's Blood

description: On Battle Start, badly Poison all enemies.
name: Hydra Blood

description: On Battle Start, both the user and all enemies are Silenced for 1 turn.
name: Seal of Solomon

description: When an enemy targets to you, reduce their healing effects by 60% before contact until the end of the turn.
name: Halahala

description: When you take damage during a turn, reduce total damage from subsequent hits that turn by 40%. This effect is reset whenever the user takes any action.
name: Hide of the Nemean Lion

description: Reduce damage of Elemental Skills that are not Neutral or Ankh by 20%.
name: Babr-e Bayan

description: At the end of the turn, convert 50% of shield on the user into HP. Then gain 12.5% of the user's HP as a Shield for 1 turn.
name: Halo

description: Increase Speed by 25. Increase Defense by 10 and reduce damage taken by Basic Attacks by 10%.
name: Herc Boots

description: Increase Speed by 25. Increase Magic Resist by 15 and reduce MP Cost by 25%.
name: Seven-League Boots

description: Increase Speed by 20. Reduce damage taken by 3% for every Stage of Stat Change on the attacker.
name: Vioarr Boots

description: Reduce the healing effects of all enemies by 25%.
name: Shamshir

description: Increase EXP gain by 50%.
name: Lantern of Diogenes
